GeometryType: The type of SpeedTree geometry on which this material will be used
WindType: The type of wind effect used on this tree. This can only go as high as it was in the SpeedTree Modeler, but you can set it to a lower option for lower quality wind and faster rendering.
LODType: The type of LOD to use
BillboardThreshold: The threshold for triangles to be removed from the bilboard mesh when not facing the camera (0 = none pass, 1 = all pass).
bAccurateWindVelocities: Support accurate velocities from wind. This will incur extra cost per vertex.
